Sweet Corn Heritage Varieties

Sweet Corn Heritage Varieties

Fruits and Vegetables Category

Description

Sweet Corn Heritage Varieties represent the apex of flavor and sustainability, offering a culinary experience that`s as rich in history as it is in taste. Grown on small-scale farms committed to preserving th environment and enhancing soil health, these corn varieties are selected for their exceptional sweetness and texture. Unlike conventional sweet corn, our heritage varieties are cultivated using organic farming methods that ensure no synthetic pesticides or fertilizers touch your food. This not only protects the ecosystem but also results in corn that`s bursting with natural flavor. Each cob is hand-picked at the perfect moment of ripeness, ensuring that the sweet, juicy kernels deliver the utmost in freshness and quality.

Specifications

  • Weight: 2 lbs per pack (approximately 4-5 cobs)
  • Size: Full-size cobs, around 7-9 inches long
  • Packaging: Compostable corn husk and recyclable paper band
  • Nutritional Information: Rich in fiber, vitamins B and C, and essential minerals

Benefits

  • Healthier Choice

    Free from synthetic pesticides and rich in nutrients.

  • Environmentally Friendly

    Grown with practices that support soil health and biodiversity.

  • Exceptional Flavor

    Unmatched sweetness and juiciness in every kernel.
